A Bear Cub is a smaller version of the weaker variant of Grizzly bear. They are only found near grizzly bears.

Contents

  • 1 Location
  • 2 Drops
    • 2.1 100%
    • 2.2 Tertiary
  • 3 Changes
    • 3.1 Gallery (historical)

Location[edit | edit source]

Location Levels Members Spawns Map
Fremennik Province - woods outside of Rellekka158Maplink
Great Kourend - north of Land's End152Maplink
Kebos Lowlands - west of Gordon's farm151Maplink
Kebos Lowlands - south of Mount Quidamortem156Maplink

Drops[edit | edit source]

The following drop rates are provided by Jagex, unless otherwise specified.

100%[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Bones1Always620
Bear fur1Always1306
Raw bear meat1Always3980

Tertiary[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Bear ribs(m)1Always[d 1]Not soldN/A
Ensouled bear head11/25801156
Clue scroll (beginner)11/90Not sold12
  1. ^ Bear ribs are only dropped during Rag and Bone Man I.
